item.description:
On the bookcase

In the corner of the room

Quiet

Watching

Just as I should be

A shut eye doll


All dressed up

Florals and lace

No motive

No voice

Only eyes

And a painted on smile


Controlled

Coddled and pampered

Maneuvered and manipulated

It’s for my worst

It’s for my best

I am a shut eye doll


Sitting quiet

Sitting still

Feeling unheard

Feeling unreal

Detach

Feeling nothing


Under her watch

Under her control

I am happy

I am blessed

Life is good

Porcelain and curls


Is she watching?

Is she there?

Am I real?

Can I move?

Can I think?

Can I do?


She’s back

Get in position

Smiles

Wide eyes

Back straight

Beautiful


Silly me

She’s always there

Always watching

Always controlling

It’s for my best

It’s for my best


I am a porcelain, shut eye doll

Always watching

And being observed

Under her control

In the corner of the room

I am her shut eye doll
item.title: Shut eye doll
